com.epoch.db

Class HWRead

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.db.DBCommon
      • com.epoch.db.HWRead
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AssgtConstants, EvalResultConstants, QuestionConstants, XMLConstants

    public final class HWRead
extends DBCommon
implements AssgtConstants, EvalResultConstants, QuestionConstants
    Sets, retrieves assignments during assembly or for homework session.

      • getQuestions

        public static Question[] getQuestions(int hwId,
                                      String userId,
                                      String[] languages,
                                      boolean isStudent)
                               throws DBException,
                                      NonExistentException
        For homework session; get the list of questions for this assignment.
        Parameters:
        hwId - assignment ID number
        userId - login ID
        languages - languages of this user in order of preference; null if English only
        isStudent - true if this request is for a student's assignment
        Returns:
        array of questions
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database
        NonExistentException - if the assignment doesn't exist

      • getQuestions

        public static Question[] getQuestions(int hwId,
                                      String userId,
                                      String qNumStr,
                                      String[] languages)
                               throws DBException,
                                      NonExistentException
        For gradebook session (show response) via homework session; get one particular question in this assignment.
        Parameters:
        hwId - assignment ID number
        userId - login ID
        qNumStr - null if should load all questions in this assignment, or serial number of single question to load
        languages - languages of this user in order of preference; null if English only
        Returns:
        array of questions
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database
        NonExistentException - if the assignment doesn't exist

      • getQuestions

        public static Question[] getQuestions(int hwId,
                                      String userId,
                                      String qNumStr,
                                      String[] languages,
                                      boolean isStudent,
                                      boolean fullLoad)
                               throws DBException,
                                      NonExistentException
        For homework or gradebook session; get all questions or one particular question in this assignment.
        Parameters:
        hwId - assignment ID number
        userId - login ID
        qNumStr - null if should load all questions in this assignment, or serial number of single question to load
        languages - languages of this user in order of preference; null if English only
        isStudent - true if this request is for a student's assignment
        fullLoad - true if the entire question should be loaded; otherwise, only flags and question data are loaded
        Returns:
        array of questions
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database
        NonExistentException - if the assignment doesn't exist
